channel.title: Dementhium Help W/ NPCS
channel.description: Hello I am using Dementhium 639, and I am trying to make the bosses stronger. Right now I am working on Nex and Corp. Neither of them really hit high or often. I want them to hit very high, very often, and make them switch to a different attack style if the player uses protection prayers. Where can I edit this?

item.title: Dementhium Help W/ NPCS
item.dc:creator: @kthillman kthillman
item.description:
@kthillman wrote:

Ya I want him to “randomly” select a attack style every now and then.

Also where is your home? We should check each others servers out… I got same source.
(WE MIGHT GET SOME IDEAS)?

HMU on a PM

Read full topic

item.title: Dementhium Help W/ NPCS
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

Will do.
I’ve spent 2 months on my server and its nearing completion. The main things I have to do is fix the damn NPC’s they’re all too weak and only use 1 attack style -.-
